advisories.impact: Visiting a website that frames malicious content may lead to UI spoofing
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

cves.credit: Yadhu Krishna M and Narendra Bhati, Manager of Cyber Security At Suma Soft Pvt. Ltd, Pune (India)

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to an unexpected process crash
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Huang Xilin of Ant Group Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to an unexpected process crash
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Huang Xilin of Ant Group Light-Year Security Lab
Huang Xilin of Ant Group Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to a cross site scripting attack
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to an unexpected process crash
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds access issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Seunghyun Lee (@0x10n) of KAIST Hacking Lab working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to an unexpected process crash
advisories.description: This is a vulnerability in open source code and Apple Software is among the affected projects. The CVE-ID was assigned by a third party. Learn more about the issue and CVE-ID at cve.org.

advisories.impact: Private Browsing tabs may be accessed without authentication
advisories.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management.
